body_html:
Thank you very much, @cameronphchen! This is a very nice workaround which is worth mentioning in the documentation. I am new to tensorflow and it took me a while to realise that derivative on diag is not implemented.
Thanks again for your help, this resolves my issue.

body:
Thank you very much, @cameronphchen! This is a very nice workaround which is worth mentioning in the documentation. I am new to tensorflow and it took me a while to realise that derivative on diag is not implemented.
Thanks again for your help, this resolves my issue.
